content: <ce:section-title>Synthesis of complex {[Zn<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>(1,3-pda)<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>(bpp)<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>]·5H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O}<ce:inf loc="post">n</ce:inf> (<ce:bold>1</ce:bold>)</ce:section-title><ce:para id="p0020" view="all">A mixture of Zn(NO<ce:inf loc="post">3</ce:inf>)<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>·6H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O (149<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mg, 0.5<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mmol), 1,3-H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>pda (95<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mg, 0.5<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mmol), bpp (100<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mg, 0.5<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mmol), NaOH (40<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mg, 1<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mmol) and deionized water (15<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mL) were loaded into a 25<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mL Teflon-lined autoclave. The autoclave was sealed and heated in an oven to 160<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>°C for two days, and then cooled to ambient temperature at a rate of 5°Ch<ce:sup loc="post">−1</ce:sup>, resulting in the formation of colorless crystalline product <ce:bold>1</ce:bold>. Yield: 163<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mg (62% yield based on Zn). Anal. Calcd for C<ce:inf loc="post">50</ce:inf>H<ce:inf loc="post">54</ce:inf>N<ce:inf loc="post">4</ce:inf>O<ce:inf loc="post">13</ce:inf>Zn<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>: C, 57.21; H, 5.18; N, 5.34%. Found: C, 57.61; H, 5.32; N, 5.42%. IR (KBr, cm<ce:sup loc="post">−1</ce:sup>): 3447(br), 3058(m), 2920(m), 1606(s), 1566(s), 1540(s), 1495(m), 1475(m), 1426(m), 1384(s), 1315(m), 1270(w), 1220(m), 1070(m), 1015(m), 822(m), 781(s), 743(s), 718(m), 698(m), 547(m), 531(w), 431(w).</ce:para>
clean_text:
Synthesis of complex {[Zn2(1,3-pda)2(bpp)2]⋅5H2O}n (1)

A mixture of Zn(NO3)2⋅6H2O (149mg, 0.5mmol), 1,3-H2pda (95mg, 0.5mmol), bpp (100mg, 0.5mmol), NaOH (40mg, 1mmol) and deionized water (15mL) were loaded into a 25mL Teflon-lined autoclave. The autoclave was sealed and heated in an oven to 160°C for two days, and then cooled to ambient temperature at a rate of 5°Ch-1, resulting in the formation of colorless crystalline product 1. Yield: 163mg (62% yield based on Zn). Anal. Calcd for C50H54N4O13Zn2: C, 57.21; H, 5.18; N, 5.34%. Found: C, 57.61; H, 5.32; N, 5.42%. IR (KBr, cm-1): 3447(br), 3058(m), 2920(m), 1606(s), 1566(s), 1540(s), 1495(m), 1475(m), 1426(m), 1384(s), 1315(m), 1270(w), 1220(m), 1070(m), 1015(m), 822(m), 781(s), 743(s), 718(m), 698(m), 547(m), 531(w), 431(w).
